019package org.jgrapes.webconlet.sysinfo;
020
021import freemarker.core.ParseException;
022import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
023import freemarker.template.Template;
024import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.io.Serializable;
027import java.time.Duration;
028import java.util.HashSet;
029import java.util.Optional;
030import java.util.Properties;
031import java.util.Set;
032import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
033import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
035import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
036import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
037import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleSession;
038import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.WebConsoleUtils;
039import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
040import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
041import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
042import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
043import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
044import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
045import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
046
047/**
048 * 
049 */
050public class SysInfoConlet
051        extends FreeMarkerConlet<SysInfoConlet.SysInfoModel> {
052
053    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
054        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.View);
055
056    /**
057     * The periodically generated update event.
058     */
059    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
064     * 
065     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
066     *            on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
067     *            sends the event to
068     */
069    public SysInfoConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
070        super(componentChannel);
071        setPeriodicRefresh(Duration.ofSeconds(1), () -> new Update());
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
076     *
077     * @param event the event
078     * @param consoleSession the console session
079     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
080     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
081     *             exception
082     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
083     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
084     */
085    @Handler
086    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event,
087            ConsoleSession consoleSession)
088            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
089            ParseException, IOException {
090        // Add SysInfoConlet resources to page
091        consoleSession.respond(new AddConletType(type())
092            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview).setDisplayNames(
093                localizations(consoleSession.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
094            .addScript(new ScriptResource()
095                .setRequires("chart.js")
096                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
097                    type(), "SysInfo-functions.ftl.js")))
098            .addCss(event.renderSupport(), WebConsoleUtils.uriFromPath(
099                "SysInfo-style.css")));
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    protected Optional<SysInfoModel> createStateRepresentation(
104            RenderConletRequestBase<?> event, ConsoleSession session,
105            String conletId) throws Exception {
106        return Optional.of(new SysInfoModel());
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
111            ConsoleSession consoleSession, String conletId,
112            SysInfoModel conletState) throws Exception {
113        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
114        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
115            Template tpl
116                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("SysInfo-preview.ftl.html");
117            consoleSession.respond(new RenderConletFromTemplate(event,
118                type(), conletId, tpl,
119                fmModel(event, consoleSession, conletId, conletState))
120                    .setRenderAs(
121                        RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
122                    .setSupportedModes(MODES));
123            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
124        }
125        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
126            Template tpl
127                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("SysInfo-view.ftl.html");
128            consoleSession.respond(new RenderConletFromTemplate(event,
129                type(), conletId, tpl,
130                fmModel(event, consoleSession, conletId, conletState))
131                    .setRenderAs(RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
132                    .setSupportedModes(MODES));
133            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
134        }
135        if (!renderedAs.isEmpty()) {
136            updateView(consoleSession, conletId);
137        }
138        return renderedAs;
139    }
140
141    private void updateView(ConsoleSession consoleSession, String conletId) {
142        if (!consoleSession.isConnected()) {
143            return;
144        }
145        Runtime runtime = Runtime.getRuntime();
146        consoleSession.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
147            conletId, "updateMemorySizes",
148            System.currentTimeMillis(), runtime.maxMemory(),
149            runtime.totalMemory(),
150            runtime.totalMemory() - runtime.freeMemory()));
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * Handle the periodic update event by sending {@link NotifyConletView}
155     * events.
156     *
157     * @param event the event
158     * @param consoleSession the console session
159     */
160    @Handler
161    public void onUpdate(Update event, ConsoleSession consoleSession) {
162        for (String conletId : conletIds(consoleSession)) {
163            updateView(consoleSession, conletId);
164        }
165    }
166
167    @Override
168    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DoNotCallGarbageCollectionExplicitly")
169    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
170            ConsoleSession consoleSession, SysInfoModel conletState)
171            throws Exception {
172        event.stop();
173        System.gc();
174        for (String conletId : conletIds(consoleSession)) {
175            updateView(consoleSession, conletId);
176        }
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * The conlet's model.
181     */
182    @SuppressWarnings("serial")
183    public static class SysInfoModel implements Serializable {
184
185        /**
186         * Return the system properties.
187         *
188         * @return the properties
189         */
190        public Properties systemProperties() {
191            return System.getProperties();
192        }
193
194        /**
195         * Return the {@link Runtime}.
196         *
197         * @return the runtime
198         */
199        public Runtime runtime() {
200            return Runtime.getRuntime();
201        }
202    }
203
204}
